com.vasilitate.vapp.sdk

Interface VappProgressListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VappProgressActivity, VappProgressWidget

    public interface VappProgressListener
    Provides methods which are called when the SMS send state for a purchase changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCancelled()
      Called when a product purchase is cancelled
      void onCompletion()
      Called when a product purchase is fully completed.
      void onError(java.lang.String message)
      Called when an error occurs in a product purchase
      void onProgressTick(int countDown)
      Called when the progress percentage updates
      void onSMSSent(int smsSentCount, int progressPercentage)
      Called when an SMS is successfully sent.

    • Method Detail

      • onSMSSent

        void onSMSSent(int smsSentCount,
               int progressPercentage)
        Called when an SMS is successfully sent.
        Parameters:
        smsSentCount - the count of sent SMS
        progressPercentage - the percentage progress

      • onProgressTick

        void onProgressTick(int countDown)
        Called when the progress percentage updates
        Parameters:
        countDown - the progress percentage

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.String message)
        Called when an error occurs in a product purchase
        Parameters:
        message - error details

      • onCompletion

        void onCompletion()
        Called when a product purchase is fully completed.

      • onCancelled

        void onCancelled()
        Called when a product purchase is cancelled
